summary: This tiny mod lets your character to walk toward near side of the screen.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#ffd966][size=4][b]This tiny mod lets your character to walk toward near side of the screen instead of backsteps when weapon is sheathed.[/b][/size][/color]

Obviously, you cannot use this mod and other walking/running mod at the same time. (e.g. Catwalk, Feminine run)[/center]
[heading][color=#ffd966]QuickPreview[/color][/heading][youtube]vdMn6reWAnA[/youtube][youtube]VIyd3eBngk8[/youtube]
[heading][color=#ffd966]Q & A[/color][/heading]
Q. Is "pseudo-waving cloak" function compatible with _______?
-Please refer to the list below.
[color=#00ff00]YES!:)[/color]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12092]Cloaks of Skyrim by Noodles[/url] *Except The Hide Cloak (confirmed by yukl)
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1040]The Art of Magicka by Zonzai and Kalell[/url] (confirmed by yukl)
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29196]Cloak Of Lace For Lady by Aronchack[/url] (confirmed by yukl)
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13486]Winter Is Coming - Cloaks by Nivea[/url] (confirmed by Nivea, big thanks!)
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36497/]Raven witch armor and Apex Werewolf by Zerofrost Satyr[/url](confirmed by yukl)
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24253/]Lost Paladins of the Divines Wrath Armor by Jerros[/url](confirmed by Constantingr)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49130/]Velvet Robes and Cloaks by jacknifelee[/url](confirmed by yukl)
[color=#ff0000]NO X([/color]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/43155/]Dyeable Cape by Vlad550077[/url] (confirmed by emieri00)
Please let me know if you find.

Q. I want to keep using backsteps but want to use "pseudo-waving cloak" function.
-Your demand is supported. Please tick the third from the top option in installation wizard.

[heading][color=#ffd966]Requirments[/color][/heading]
NOTHING AT ALL.
[color=red]ONLY IF YOU CHOOSE BBP OPTION, YOU NEED [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26800]XPMS[/url], [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11811]FNIS' "SKELETON Arm Fix" PATCH[/url]
AND PROPER BODY/ARMOR/CLOTH MESHES.[/color]

[heading][color=#ffd966]Installation[/color][/heading]I strongly recommend you to use [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1334/]MO[/url]/[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1840/]BAIN[/url]/[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/modmanager/]NMM[/url] to install.

[MO and NMM user]
Activate and follow the instructions of installation wizard.
[color=#ff0000][size=5]If you're using MO 1.2.10, you need to update it to 1.2.11 to install the files correctly.[/size][/color]

[BAIN User]
Open Installers tab, right click, select "Wizard", and follow the instructions of installation wizard.

[Manual]
Select and copy the HKX files to:
(Male)Datameshesactorscharacteranimationsmale, mt_walk***.hkx mt_run***.hkx mt_sprintforward.hkx
(Female)Datameshesactorscharacteranimationsfemale, mt_walk***.hkx mt_run***.hkx mt_sprintforward.hkx
(Swimming)Datameshesactorscharacteranimations, swim***.hkx
(Optional)Copy ESP file to Data folder.

[heading][color=#ffd966]Uninstallation[/color][/heading]This mod has no script, no havok behavior, so never dirty your save file.
[color=red]You can uninstall it whenever you want.[/color]

[MO and NMM user]
Simply deactivate this mod.

[BAIN User]
Open Installers tab, right click, select "Uninstall".

[Manual Uninstallation]
Delete the HKX files you installed.
(Optional)Delete 360WalkandRunPlus-RunBackwardSpeedAdjust.esp if you installed.

[heading][color=#ffd966]Changelog[/color][/heading]
v3.1.3 2014-08-24
!Fixed deformation of female fingers
!Optimized all female animation files
!Fixed Fomod Installer again.

v3.1.2 2013-12-08
!Fixed wrong file structure

v3.1.1 2013-12-08
!Fixed incorrect filename

v3.1.0 2013-11-16
!Fixed crashed butt shape of TBBP Mesh

v3.0.2 2013-9-22
!Fixed Fomod Installer again.

v3.0.1 2013-6-9
!Fixed Fomod Installer

v3.0.0 2013-6-1
+Added Head Direction Option
+Added 360 Swimming

v2.3.0 2013-4-22
+Completed BBP effect version.
+Compatible with Wrye Bash (BAIN Installer)

v2.2.0 2013-4-14
+Added BBP effect version, but 360 only.
+Added an ESP file to adjust run backward movement speed.

v2.0.1 2013-4-8
!Fixed corrupted Skirt L Bones of male walking animation.

v2.0.0 2013-4-7 (Nexus release)
+Featuring pseudo-waving cloak
+Added Sprint

v1.1.1 2013-3-23
+Added female version
!Fixed broken left hand fingers problem(Vanilla bug)

v1.0.0 2013-3-22 (Initial Release)
+Added male version
